column4: How do you query the on/off state of a wireless NIC when there is no hardware LED and the switch is a Fn+F2 keyboard shortcut (i.e. soft-switch) rather than a two position physical switch?
There may be a better way but often there is an entry in /proc
- thanks. I just grep'd /proc looking for "wireless" - several hits but none that also mention switch - I did find /pproc/kallsyms has ipw2100_switch_mode
